mapper.select: select * from message order by id desc limit #{numBegin}, #{pageSize}
select * from message where userType = #{userType} and userId = #{userId} order by id desc limit #{page.numBegin}, #{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into message(title, message, userType, userId, createAt) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userType}, #{userId}, #{createAt})
mapper.update: update message set title = #{title} and content = #{content} where id = #{id}
